sentences.en: An astronomer can determine the brightness of each star.
sentences.cn: 天文学家能够测定每颗恒星的亮度。

sentences.en: An inquiry was set up to determine the cause of the accident.
sentences.cn: 已展开调查以确定事故原因。

sentences.en: Antitrust authorities must investigate the effect and purpose of an agreement to determine its legality.
sentences.cn: 反托拉斯当局需要通过调查该协定的影响和目的来确认其合法性.

sentences.en: Chromosomes also determine the sex of animals.
sentences.cn: 染色体也决定动物的性别.

sentences.en: Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire.
sentences.cn: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

sentences.en: It seems political expedi-ency, rather than absolute economic need, will determine who gains from the conflict.
sentences.cn: 看来是政治上的权宜之计，而不是绝对的经济需求，将决定谁会从这场冲突中获益。

sentences.en: It's the business of the individual to determine his own attitude towards religion.
sentences.cn: 对宗教持何种态度是个人的事情。

sentences.en: Radiology was used to determine the distribution of the disease.
sentences.cn: 曾利用放射学方法来测定这种疾病的分布.

sentences.en: Shall we determine what we are going to do next?
sentences.cn: 我们来确定一下下一步该做什么 吧 ?

sentences.en: Some banks charge if you access your account to determine your balance.
sentences.cn: 有些银行对查询账户余额要收费。

sentences.en: The age of a wine is a determining factor as to how it tastes.
sentences.cn: 酒的年份对于酒的味道是个决定性因素。

sentences.en: The amount of available water determines the number of houses that can be built.
sentences.cn: 可用的水量决定可以建造多少房子。

sentences.en: The date of the court case has not yet been determined.
sentences.cn: 庭审日期尚未确定。

sentences.en: The size of the fish will determine the thickness of the steaks.
sentences.cn: 鱼的大小决定鱼排的厚度。

sentences.en: These voters often determine the outcome of statewide elections.
sentences.cn: 这些选民们往往决定着全州大选的结果。

sentences.en: They determined to start early.
sentences.cn: 他们决定早点出发。

sentences.en: Together these factors determine the depth of focus.
sentences.cn: 这些因素综合起来决定了景深。

sentences.en: We both looked up to determine the source of the water.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都向上看,以便确定水从何处流下来.

sentences.en: We determined to leave at once.
sentences.cn: 我们决定立即离开。

sentences.en: We may determine the height of a mountain by trigonometry.
sentences.cn: 我们可用三角原理测定山的高度.

sentences.en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.--Zig Ziglar
sentences.cn: 决定你人生高度的，不是你的才能，而是你的态度。

words.tran_cn: 确定性的；命运注定论的
决定因素；[数] 行列式

trans.tran_cn: 查明，测定，准确算出，决定，敲定，安排，下决心
trans.tran_en: if something determines something else, it directly influences or decides it
if something determines something else, it directly influences or decides it
to find out the facts about something
